entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
